CustomField.description: TRUE if the email activity has a reply date value (from Outreach.io or Regie.ai).
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Outreach_Replied_At__c ) && ISBLANK( regieai__RepliedAt__c ), FALSE, TRUE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TRUE if the email activity has a reply date value (from Outreach.io or Regie.ai).
CustomField.label: Has Replied?
